nodes.text: Naatu was a male humanoid businessman of unknown species in operation during the Great Galactic War.

He was present for a business meeting held at the Star Cluster Casino on the smuggler's moon of Nar Shaddaa in 3653 BBY. He and several other individuals were meeting to discuss their interests and how those interests would change now that the reconstituted Sith Empire had forced the Republic to sign the Treaty of Coruscant. As the meeting was called to order, Naatu was exposed as having provided information to the Republic and was summarily executed by Nok Drayen, who then introduced Lord Angral to the group to present the group with a proposition.
